title: System Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Self-Efficacy-Based Simulation for Advanced Procedural Skill Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform complex procedural skills in VR-based simulations with 80% accuracy within 4 weeks.
Participants demonstrate a 25% or greater improvement in self-efficacy as measured before and after training
Learners reduce task completion time by 20% based on peer comparison feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
